alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 9:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont County through 945 PM MDT... At 926 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Royal Gorge, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Royal Gorge and Canon City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
